NYSE History Documentation

Getting Started

Usage

Welcome to NYSE History!

Download the application below.

Download

Unzip the downloaded file and run the application.

Note for the trainer: In this assessment I did not create an installer file to avoid dumping unecessary files to the one who will use the application. I can create an installer file but to save the trainer some time, I only made a portable application that can run without installing.

Add Price

Step 1. On the upper right hand corner of the application, click the button "Add Price".

Step 2. Fill in the form, then click submit.

Edit Price

Select the data you want. For this example we will be selecting the first data. Click "Edit" on the right column.

Change the data you want to edit, then click submit.

Remove Price

Removing price is in the bottom left part of the Edit form. Click "Remove price" and a confirmation will show up for you to permanently remove the price.

Selecting Dates

The number of prices given on the application are handled by the Start Date and End Date on the upper left corner of the application. This is to avoid data-overloading as there are so many prices inside the database.

By default, the selected date is from the start of the year 2010 and ends in the last day of 2010.

The application will automatically fetch a new data from the database right after selecting the desired date.

Sorting

By default the current sorting of the prices is in descending order from the Date column.

Select the section you want to sort and it will automatically sort for you.

With Dates

Specifying a Start Date

https://jolly-perlman-e277e1.netlify.com/.netlify/functions/daily-price?startdate=[yyyy-mm-dd]

example:

https://jolly-perlman-e277e1.netlify.com/.netlify/functions/daily-price?startdate=2010-01-01

Specifying a Start Date with End Date

https://jolly-perlman-e277e1.netlify.com/.netlify/functions/daily-price?startdate=[yyyy-mm-dd]&enddate=[yyyy-mm-dd]

example:

https://jolly-perlman-e277e1.netlify.com/.netlify/functions/daily-price?startdate=2010-01-01&enddate=2010-12-01
